about_the_game:
Join in with the fun as you’re given the job of returning errant birds to their nests by the farm Rooster, the catch is, you've got to do this in the most efficient way possible. Fortunately, the lazy birds are rather round and roll easily at the slightest touch, bouncing upright when they come to a stop.



Rolling each lost bird to it's correct type of nest completes the day, but watch out, the Rooster will be watching your every move, take too many and he may fail you! Luckily, he lets you in on a little secret early into your SokoFarming career allowing you to undo moves to correct your mistakes!



Move from farm to farm as the seasons progress with each new location presenting our SokoFarmers with increasingly baffling puzzles as Chickens, Ducks, Geese and even the occasional log or two join in making everything just that little bit more mind bogglingly great.



No-one said being a SokoFarmer was a push over, but it sure is fun!

Features:

100 Sokoban puzzles to master
Customisable player characters
Play across all four seasons in one game
Each new season adds additional puzzle complexity
Multiple bird and nest types for increased difficulty
Single axis obstacles to add to the fun
Move count targets to promote re-playability
Cute, cosy graphics and animation
Bouncy, fun sound effects and music
detailed_description:
Join in with the fun as you’re given the job of returning errant birds to their nests by the farm Rooster, the catch is, you've got to do this in the most efficient way possible. Luckily, he lets you in on a little secret early into your SokoFarming career allowing you to undo moves to correct your mistakes!



Move from farm to farm as the seasons progress with each new location presenting our SokoFarmers with increasingly baffling puzzles as Chickens, Ducks, Geese and even the occasional log or two join in making everything just that little bit more mind bogglingly great.



No-one said being a SokoFarmer was a push over, but it sure is fun!

name: SokoFarm

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) and above
  • Processor: Intel i5-4670 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 capable devices, NVidia GTX 770 or AMD/Intel equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit) and above
  • Processor: Intel i7-8700 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.2 capable devices, NVidia GTX 1070 or AMD/Intel equivalent
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: SokoFarm is a Sokoban puzzle game with bright, cosy visuals and cute characters played out in a sleepy rural setting. Roll Chonky Chickens, Ducks and Geese to their preferred nests in the fewest moves possible. Play through the seasons to see new farms and features for even more brain teasing fun!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Dutch, Russian, Spanish - Latin America
